settings.title: puberica helps in research and evidence

settings.editor: We offer an array of services, including scientific and medical writing, editing, peer-reviewing, and data collection and analysis services that cover academic, scientific, regulatory business, medical, and technology. We support in the development of the manuscripts and thesis, creating abstracts and posters, case reports, slide decks, and evidence-based response documents. We assist life science, pharmaceutical, medical device manufacturers, hospitals, healthcare providers, payers, technology companies, and research scholars in their quest for a credible scientific & evidence-based writing partner

settings.title: Leveraging over 50 years of expertise in Medical Scientific Research, Analyses & Development.

settings.editor: We offer comprehensive solutions to support our clients, from the discovery of science to marketing communication while contributing to better patient outcomes to stay ahead of the dynamic healthcare landscape. Our expertise represents diverse fields, including life science, engineering, healthcare and medicine and representing across the globe.

settings.title: THE ADVANTAGES</BR> OF WORKING WITH US…

settings.editor: Pubrica works with you to create successful scientific and medical documents with our best minds and passion.

Over 500+ academic editors, medical writers, and industry veterans across the globe have been onboarded based on the custom needs of our clients. We can also accommodate ad hoc requests and fluctuations..
All writers are certified by American Medical Writing Association (AMWA) and European Medical Writing Association (EMWA). Compliance with International Conference on Harmonization (ICH), and more.
We work across a wide range of therapeutic areas, e.g., neurology or cardiology. We work with more than 200 specializations with expertise in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM).
By partnering with Pubrica, Publishers, universities, and research groups can get special discounts on all end-to-end editorial and journal publication services.
We are ISO 9001:2015 certified organization and follow the Uniform Requirements of the International Committee of Medical Journal Editors (ICMJE. We assure 99% quality output delivery..
We comply with the GDPR data protection policy by ensuring stringent privacy & confidentiality of your data. We also follow COPE
Explore our latest news, tips, advice and fresh perspectives publishing guidelines, procedures, roadmaps, etc.
